Issue.summary: node-sdk getters missing on some properties
Issue.description: { return client.getUserContext(id, true); }) .then((user) => { return { publicCertPEM: user.getIdentity()._certificate, privateKeyPEM: user.getSigningIdentity()._signer._key.toBytes() }; }); } {code} Here retrieving the certificate and the signer I have used the internal properties directly as no getters were available. >
